mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_elastic_cluster (cluster_code, cluster_name, address, current_cluster, default_cluster, cluster_desc) VALUES (#{clusterCode}, #{clusterName}, #{address}, #{currentCluster}, #{defaultCluster}, #{clusterDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_elastic_cluster where current_cluster = true;
mapper.update: UPDATE t_elastic_cluster SET cluster_policy = 'none', monitor_start_time = NULL, monitor_end_time = NULL WHERE cluster_code = #{clusterCode}
